item.description: Officials said Iran and the U.S. made some progress during the latest round of talks in Rome on Friday.

item.title: Israel’s Eurovision Campaign Went All the Way to the Top

item.description: Among a flurry of executive actions, Mr. Trump directed the nation’s nuclear safety regulator to speed up approvals for new reactors.

item.title: Trump seeks to boost nuclear industry and overhaul safety regulator
